overview: Claudio began his entrepreneurial career when he was 19 years old, creating a digital media company. He is a dynamic and creative person who is addicted to travelling and good music! With his burning desire for new ideas that change the way people live, like a big baby he never stops dreaming. And one night in December 2011, he dreamed up a new model for creating value out of ideas with the support of a community. From that night on he’s never stopped thinking of how to mak e his own idea a reality! In Starteed, Claudio looks for ways to improve and innovate on a daily basis!
